body_html:
I met the same problem.

GPU: GTX 1070
pytorch: 0.12.0(should be)

However, I can not install the cuda80 version because of the poor network condition.

Installing the pytorch from source fixed it.

body:
I met the same problem. 

```
GPU: GTX 1070
pytorch: 0.12.0(should be)
```

However, I can not install the cuda80 version because of the poor network condition.

**Installing the pytorch from source** fixed it.
